globals: function find(arr, predicate) {for (var i = 0, ln = arr.length; i < ln; i++) {var value = arr[i];if (predicate(value, i, arr)) {return value;}}}

function calculateColour(size) {var colours = {0.1: '#33CC00',0.2: '#5CC200',0.3: '#85B800',0.4: '#ADAD00',0.5: '#D6A300',0.6: '#FF9900',0.7: '#FF7300',0.8: '#FF4D00',0.9: '#FF2600',1: '#FF0000'};var position = (size - minSize) / (maxSize - minSize);var keys = Object.keys(colours).map(function (key) {return parseFloat(key);}).sort();var matchingKey = find(keys, function (key) {return key > position;});return colours[matchingKey];}
